resources.string: Oh, <PlayerName>!
<shy>This is a really nice <birthday> gift.
<glee>Thank you very much.
<pumped>You’re a bloody legend, <PlayerName>.
<yes>Too bloody good I reckon.
Take this for your trouble!
Just between you and me...
<yes>I heard <NPCName> grows her hair herself.
<haha>From the ground, I mean.
<pumped><NPCName> won’t let anybody NEAR his hair.
<no>I offered to trim his beard, but I ended up walking away with a bunch of tools I don’t need?
<boohoo>…they were really expensive.
<NPCName>’s hair grows really slowly…
Either that, or he trims it himself, I guess?
<NPCName> comes to see me every now and again.
I guess he really likes the empty bit in the middle?
<thinking>He’d have such long, full, beautiful locks if I didn’t cut his hair so often…
Each to their own, I guess.
<no><NPCName> asked me to cut her doll’s hair once.
<no>It looked just like her, but tiny!
<scared>That thing gave me the creeps.
<yes><NPCName> keeps asking if I have a Hair Cutting licence.
<pumped>And I keep telling her there is no such thing!
<haha>But she seems adamant that there should be!
<glee><NPCName>’s hair is sooo soft!
<glee>It’s like <animalName> and clouds and the wind from a butterfly’s wings…
<thinking><NPCName> always asks to keep his hair clippings after a trim.
<yes>He said something about cataloguing every strand?
<no><NpcName> never tips me when he comes in for a trim.
<no>I mean, I don’t ask for tips, anyway.
<thinking>But he always makes sure to let me know he won’t be tipping…
Welcome!
Can I interest you in a little trim?
Yes please!
I wanted to chat.
No thanks.
Please take a seat!
If you change your mind, drop by.
Okay, what can do with your "doo" today? <haha>
A haircut or colour change is <sprite=11>5000.
A new hairstyle!
A new hair colour!
I've changed my mind.
Alright! Lets get started!
Alright! Lets get started!
I see. Style isn't for everyone!
Hey there, I’m <myName>.
<glee>I’m a hairstylist!
<shy>I’m kinda new at it though.
<glee>If you would like a haircut I could always use the practice!
I’m having a bloody bonza day, <PlayerName>.
How are you enjoying yourself?
I hope you got a <Snag> while they were still hot!
Happy <IslandDay>, <PlayerName>.
It’s going to be a great day, full of tunes, sun and some bloody beautiful <Snags>.
It's going to be grouse!
Wow!
<glee>I am really digging the sky’s new colours tonight.
<thinking>It's kinda like beautiful hair...
It’s amazing, isn’t it, <PlayerName>?
<NPCName> made me a rippa of a <Snag>!
<no>Everything I cook usually ends up with some hair in it.
<yes>At least I know it’s not my own hair.
<worried>That would be so gross.
My family would never let me near their hair.
<no>They said that I'd always cut something of theirs that wasn't hair.
<haha>Did they not know that looking good can sometimes hurt?
<thinking>Back when I was studying to be a chef I would always cut my fingers.
<haha>I'm just not that great at using anything sharp!
I worked in the coal mines back in <SouthCity> for a few years...
<yes>I use to cut some of my friends hair while we were down there.
Everyone said they loved what I did…
<boohoo>Until we all came back up into the light...
<shy>I tend to get a bit shaky when I get nervous.
<shy>I mean, that would be okay if I didn't get so nervous when I was giving haircuts!
<yes>Hair is like nature's clothing.
<glee>And just like clothes, the way you style it can show off your personality!
<thinking>I've been thinking about dying my hair.
<no>I wish knew a hairdresser…
<shocked>Oh wait!
<yes>I've been pretty happy with myself lately, <PlayerName>.
<proud>I haven't cut anyone's ear off or anything since I started visiting <IslandName>.
<thinking>Before I was a hairdresser I had a part-time job as a pet stylist.
<glee>It's where I learnt my best cuts and styles!
<yes>They’re amazing innovative styles, so nobody asks for them a second time.
Have you ever tried cutting topiaries?
<yes>You should totally do it if you get the chance.
<haha>It's wonderfully fun and the plants don't even complain when you mess it up!
<yes>I've had a lot of jobs before I settled on hairstylist.
<yes>My parents told me to do what I was good at.
<proud>But I think that's just too easy!
<thinking>Hey, <PlayerName>, I was thinking about taking on an apprentice...
Maybe they could teach me a thing or two?
<yes>The best thing about hair is that it grows back, so we can always try again.
<shy>Not that we’ll need to! It’s just nice to have some backup options.
But, have you considered going bald, <PlayerName>?
<proud>I am, without a doubt, the absolute best hairdresser here on <IslandName>.
<haha>I mean, honestly, it’s not even close!
<glee>I'm doing a special today!
<pumped>50 percent off!
<shy>Full price though.
<yes>Some of my best customers pay me NOT to cut their hair.
<glee>They’re such darlings.
<pumped>My whole life people have been trying to take sharp objects away from me, but look at me now!
<haha>I’m my own boss!
<dance>Scissors forever!
<shy>I’m so, so sorry, <PlayerName>. I don’t know what came over me.
People back in <SouthCity> generally went for the boring haircuts.
<yes>So it's nice to be doing something different here on <IslandName>.
<proud>I’m the best at jigsaw puzzles.
<pumped>Give me any two pieces and I can make em fit together no problem!
<thinking>I think a <animalName> would make excellent hairdresser.
<yes>With their sharp jagged teeth and persistent attitude, they have all the right qualities.
<worried>I really hope one of them doesn’t open up a shop around here, or I’d be out of business!
<no>Don’t let anybody ever tell you that you can’t do something.
<no>Even if you have none of the skills, or are poorly suited, or are physically incapable, it doesn’t matter!
<pumped>Do what I did and just do it anyway!
You know what?
<no>My <Kite> didn’t turn out half bad after all?
<yes>It’s not how it looks, but how it flies!
<haha>Kinda like the haircuts I give, right <PlayerName>?
Hey <PlayerName>.
Glad to see you could make it to <SkyFest>.
Let’s have some fun!
Woah!
So this is what an <Aurora> looks like?
I guess I really didn’t pay attention before now?
<glee>It’s beautiful!
<boohoo>I should have asked for some help with my <Kite>...
<no>I’m just not good with scissors!
<shy>I guess it doesn’t matter in the end, as long as it flies okay.
Right?
